context: <user>  I need to book an appointment at the salon. <system>  Okay, what time do you want the appointment to be? <user>  I need it to be at 14:30, and the salon I want to go to is Salon Valenti Hair Nails Skin. <system>  Alright, what day should I make the appointment for? <user>  I want to go on the 9th. <system>  Alright, tell me if this sounds right then. Your appointment will be for 2:30 pm on March 9th at Salon Valenti Hair Nails Skin. <user>  No actually I wanted the appointment for 1 in the afternoon. <system>  Alright I'll fix that, does 1 pm on March 9th sound right?<user>  That's perfect. Is the salon unisex? <system>  Alright then I've confirmed the appointment, and yes the salon is unixes.<user>  Great, what is their phone number? <system>  The number is 510-498-1090.<user>  Thanks, that's gonna be it. <system>
